pages.text: Wecome to basic Rocket creation.$(br2)A simple crafting table is too unsophisticated to be restricted to merely 9 material slots.....$(br)There is no way a rocket can me made in the same place one makes a mere hoe!$(br2)Its time to make a table worthy of Rocket Creation

pages.title: Rocket builder
pages.text: $(br)A workbench that can handle the extreme and alien materials to produce one of the greatest methods of travel ever.
